post.author: chilhoan kwon
post.content:
We cannot offer you a position at this time. The US government has but a cap
on the amount of H1-B visas it will give out, and it will not be giving out
anymore H1-B visas until October of this year. If you are a permanent
resident of Canada, then you would need an H1-B to work here. Please contact
me in September if you are still interested in our company
post.title: 아래의 편지를 받았음. 아마 영주권자 미국취업 올 10월까지 안될것같네요.
